vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.17.7
§ Michaiah = "who is like God"
n pr m
1) one of the princes of Jehoshaphat whom he sent to teach the law of Jehovah in the cities of Judah
2) daughter of Uriel of Gibeah, wife of king Rehoboam of Judah, and mother of king Abijah of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   mujer; hija de Uriel; madre de Abiam; (b)   hombre; funcionario; en tiempos de Josafat
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米該亞 这个字在原文的意思是 "有誰像神"
陽性專有名詞 人名
1) 約沙法所派至猶大各城去教訓百姓耶和華的律法的一位臣子 (代下 17:7)
陰性專有名詞 人名
2) 基比亞人烏列的女兒, 猶大王羅波安的妻子和猶大王亞比雅的母親 (代下 13:2)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
米该亚 这个字在原文的意思是 "有谁像神"
阳性专有名词 人名
1) 约沙法所派至犹大各城去教训百姓耶和华的律法的一位臣子 (代下 17:7)
阴性专有名词 人名
2) 基比亚人乌列的女儿, 犹大王罗波安的妻子和犹大王亚比雅的母亲 (代下 13:2)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.15.2;
daughter of: Uriel (H0222I) and Tamar (H8559I); married to Rehoboam (H7346);
mother of: Abijah (H0029I), Attai (H6262I), Ziza (H2124H) and Shelomith (H8019G); also called Micaiah (KJV: Michaiah) at 2Ch.13.2;
§ Michaiah = "who is like God"
n pr m
1) one of the princes of Jehoshaphat whom he sent to teach the law of Jehovah in the cities of Judah
2) daughter of Uriel of Gibeah, wife of king Rehoboam of Judah, and mother of king Abijah of Judah
